* cipher.txt 파일을 열어볼게요.

![alt P1](https://github.com/simnple/Christmas_ctf/blob/main/Crypto/imgs/P1.png)<br>
```
```
* 위 글자들은 base64로 암호화 되어있는거에요.

* URL: https://dencode.com/
* 여러번 base64로 decode 하다보면

![alt P2](https://github.com/simnple/Christmas_ctf/blob/main/Crypto/imgs/P2.png)
```
Flag: Christmas{PAs3_w0rD_1s_SanTA_VeRY_Go0D_Fr1Ends}
```
